channel.title: Whonix time synchronization consistently fails
channel.description: Hello guys, I am somewhat a newer whonix user and things have been quite alright with the exception of the time sync. most times the sync fails and sometimes it affects my access to the net through tor. if the time sync fails, sometimes I can't even access the web. The error says to report the issue if it keeps happening and well, it does keep happening.... can anybody offer some insight on this issue please? Thank you!

item.title: Whonix time synchronization consistently fails
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi whonixhelp1

Does your host system keep the correct time? If you use pause / suspend / save / resume feature on your virtualizer, it can cause time issues.

https://whonix.org/wiki/Post_Install_Advice#Network_Time_Syncing
https://whonix.org/wiki/Troubleshooting#Clock_Fix

You can use this site to check your system clock against.

https://timeanddate.com/worldclock/timezone/utc

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix time synchronization consistently fails
item.dc:creator: whonixhelp1
item.description:
Hello guys, I am somewhat a newer whonix user and things have been quite alright with the exception of the time sync. most times the sync fails and sometimes it affects my access to the net through tor. if the time sync fails, sometimes I can’t even access the web. The error says to report the issue if it keeps happening and well, it does keep happening… can anybody offer some insight on this issue please? Thank you!

Read full topic
